# Matteo Giardino

> Personal website and portfolio of Matteo Giardino, Italian developer and entrepreneur

## About

Matteo Giardino is a developer and entrepreneur based in Turin, Italy. Born in 1998, he discovered programming at age 16 and has since built multiple successful ventures:

- **Westudents**: Created at age 18, this educational app has helped nearly 500,000 students
- **Devv**: Founded in 2022, a platform revolutionizing how people learn to code, with over 130,000 followers
- **Wezard**: A digital products agency sold in January 2024

Notable: At 18, Matteo dropped out of university and declined a job offer from Google to pursue entrepreneurship.

## Main Sections

### Home (/)
Personal introduction, about section with journey timeline, featured projects, services overview, testimonials, and latest blog posts.

### Blog (/blog)
Technical articles and insights about programming, web development, entrepreneurship, and technology. Includes both local posts and Substack content.

### Projects (/projects)
Portfolio of significant projects including:
- Devv: Programming education platform
- Westudents: Educational app for students
- Oltre: Digital project
- Testy: Testing/QA project
- Unlimited: Digital product
- Built Different: Project initiative
- uTravel: Travel application
- WeSchool: Educational technology

### Services (/services)
Professional services offered including web development, app development, consulting, and technical mentorship.

### Contact (/contacts)
Get in touch for collaboration opportunities, consulting, or project inquiries. Includes calendar integration for booking appointments.

### Learning Products (/learn)
Educational offerings and courses:

#### Programmatore Leggendario (/programmatore-leggendario)
Comprehensive programming course in Italian ("Legendary Programmer"). Includes what's covered, who it's for, testimonials, and pricing information.

#### The Coder Lab (TCL) (/tcl)
Advanced coding laboratory program with mentorship. Features course details, mentor information, target audience, included content, testimonials, and pricing.

#### The Coder Boost (TCB) (/tcb)
Accelerated coding program for skill enhancement.

## Site Features

- Built with Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Content managed through MDX
- Responsive design with dark/light mode
- SEO optimized with meta tags and JSON-LD
- RSS feed available
- Sitemap for search engines
- Code syntax highlighting with Shiki
- Table of contents for blog posts
- Image zoom functionality

## Technology Stack

- Framework: Next.js 14
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- UI Components: shadcn/ui, Radix UI
- Content: MDX with Contentlayer
- Animation: Framer Motion, GSAP
- Language: TypeScript

## Key URLs

- Homepage: https://matteogiardino.com

- Learning: https://matteogiardino.com/learn

## External Links

- Westudents: https://westudents.it
- Devv: https://devv.it
- Wezard: https://wezard.it

## Social Media

Matteo has a significant following in the Italian developer community with 130,000+ people learning programming through his content.

## Languages

Primary language: Italian (Italiano)
Content also available in: English (selected articles)

## Expertise

- Full-stack web development
- Mobile app development
- Programming education and mentorship
- Entrepreneurship and startup building
- Product development
- Technical consulting

## Last Updated

This llms.txt file represents the site structure and content as of November 2025.
